title: Chris Colfer: Meet the Author
itunes:subtitle: Hear Golden Globe-winner Chris Colfer ("Glee") discuss his  book, "The Land of Stories," a fast-paced adventure that uniquely combines our modern-day world with the enchanting calm of classic fairytales.
